name: Cave Escape (itch) (Giovanni Damian)
description:
Cave Escape is a 2D Action Platformer where you play as a mysterious figure intent to get out of this underground world. During the 3 levels you will come across different obstacles, such as spikes, falling rocks, flying enemies and huge walls, all of which can be left behind using the vast array of abilities at your disposal. With your Sword, Dash and Spirit ability you will be able to destroy everything in your path. but be careful, as the first hit you take might just be your last.

(It is recommended to play this game with low volume as some sound effects might be very loud)
